Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Map/toRel

Function rel[&K, &V] toRel(map[&K, &V] M)
Description Covert map M to a relation.
Examples 
rascal>import Map;
ok
rascal>toRel(("apple": 1, "pear": 2, "ananas": 3));
rel[str, int]: {
  <"ananas",3>,
  <"apple",1>,
  <"pear",2>
}
[Edit] | [New] | [Compile Course] | [Warnings]
